archimate:DataObject.name: Recovery Key
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A special Private Key used for purposes of recovering a Wallet after loss or compromise. In the DKMS key management protocol, a Recovery Key may be cryptographically sharded for secret sharing among multiple Trustees.
